nothing much

just some words

 

Poems

yesterday

vibes

remember

write

your eyes

weather

the love poem (we have all been waiting for)

up here

be

fear

toque me to the ballgame

met

word

smalltalk

shortbread cookie instructions

the most honest love poem (and also an anthem for the non-committal)

vain

wait

bored

moon

rising

objects in space

thinking

eyes or words?

small world

barely afloat

a beautiful truth

white dress, doll-like pose, orange balloon - my, oh my, they grow up so soon

crockashit

lost

toronto, my love

forgotten

reflection

love

and his heart beats were out of tune

patterns of irregularity

i need an eye scanner

saying it again won't help either

in response to cummings

that, and the postage costs were unbearable

zen and the art of motorcycle maintenance

kindness

engage in other pleasantries instead

wake

stepping stones and lonesome stars

fate

life

mad men

hold on

your smile

focus

just plain folk

on the way home

your eyes

foolishness

without you

blah

in the dirt

your nose

fix

mirror

look up

all our words

follower

paces

search

here

recapture

circular

light

just died

locked

time and tide

memories

then again

voices that rise

into the wind

life is like a box of chocolates

of doers and dreamers

magic is music

sticks and stones

no time

take a haiku

my greatest trick

loose ends

a page

out of service

no poet

a letter

without you

breathe

not your madness

put me in that box

reflection

my every moment gone

who i am

emptiness

hit and run

 

aphorisms

poems

shorts

colophon
